channel.title: Trucks Trailers_truck General on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Trucks Trailers_truck General on Universal

item.title: E00127
item.description: Ford F450, Service truck, V8 Powers stroke diesel engine, 5 speed manual transmission, LHD, standard cab, work bed, welder/generator including cables, fuel tank including pump, 2 air hose reels, bolt on crane, storage boxes, 235/85R16 Michelin tyres 70% remaining. Truck is in good and clean condition.

item.title: E02595
item.description: 2014 new build tray body fitted with twist locks fitted on 2008 used chassis, 88,150 kms, Palfinger 32080 crane fitted with 4 extensions c.w. radio remote control, front and rear telescopic jack legs, upright exhaust, 16 speed manual gearbox, new Pirelli 295/80R22.5 tyres fitted, Mounted on 2008 8x4 Hino 700 series (Very Low Kilometers), 420HP, airco, autolube, right hand drive. Truck is workshop tested and repaired. Truck is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E03335
item.description: Hino 700FY with crane, 2007 8x4 Hino 700 series, 420HP, 221,464 kms, body with twist locks, HIAB 220C-5 crane fitted with 5 extensions c.w. radio remote control and rear legs, airco, upright exhaust, 16 speed manual gearbox, NEW Pirelli 295/80R22.5 tyres fitted, reverse camera, aluminium tool lockers, right hand drive. Truck is workshop tested and repaired. Truck is in very good and clean condition. Inspections are welcome!
